item.title: Need Help Plz
item.dc:creator: @TheTutMan TheTutMan
item.description:
@TheTutMan wrote:

so i was fixing my health bars and prayer bars and i have this code

public void drawPrayer() { int prayer; String OD = signlink.findcachedir()+"/Sprites/Gameframe/Orbs/"; String cPR = RSInterface.interfaceCache[31134].disabledMessage; int currentPR = Integer.parseInt(cPR); String mPR = RSInterface.interfaceCache[31135].disabledMessage; int maxPR2 = Integer.parseInt(mPR); prayer = (int)(((double)currentPR / (double)maxPR2) * 100D); ORBS[0] = new Sprite(OD+"ORBS 0.PNG", 27, getOrbFill(prayer)); if(!prayClicked){ if(!is480){ if(prayHover){ ORBS[1].drawSprite(226, 10); }else if(!prayHover){ ORBS[1].drawSprite(226, 10); } } else { if(prayHover){ ORBS[15].drawSprite(190, 53); } else { ORBS[14].drawSprite(190, 53); } } ORBS[4].drawSprite(227, 20); } else if(prayClicked){ if(!is480){ if(prayHover){ ORBS[1].drawSprite(226, 10); } else if(!prayHover){ ORBS[1].drawSprite(226, 10); } } else { if(prayHover){ ORBS[15].drawSprite(190, 53); } else { ORBS[14].drawSprite(190, 53); } } ORBS[6].drawSprite(205, 135); } ORBS[0].drawSprite(227, 20); if(prayer <= 25) { if(loopCycle % 20 < 10); { ORBS[6].drawSprite(205, 135); } } else { ORBS[5].drawSprite(223, 140); } int Y = 165; if(is480){ Y = 165; } smallText.method382(getOrbTextColor(prayer), 215, RSInterface.interfaceCache[31134].disabledMessage, Y, true); }

but i need it so when its like 50% its is hafe way down i know it has something to do whith this

ORBS[0].drawSprite(227, 20); if(prayer <= 25) { if(loopCycle % 20 < 10); { ORBS[6].drawSprite(205, 135); } } else { ORBS[5].drawSprite(223, 140); }

but when it is like 0% it is not even hafe way down the bar
